BTF Media, Hernan Caffiero Create Chile Office ...  Puenzo showrun "La Jaura" ("The Pack") was a standout at late March's online Series Mania. Produced by Chile's Invercine & Wood ("Ramona," "Mary & Mike") and Germany's Storyhouse Productions, "Dignity," a thriller about the hunt for a former Nazi, was the first original series order at Germany's Joyn, a Discovery-ProSiebenSat1 joint venture. The three series joined Caffiero's "The Suspended Mourning" for a Chilean Series on the Rise showcase at this year's Berlinale. "Chile is an increasingly important market within the industry," said Ivonne Vela, BTF head of communications. She added: "We are very happy to open a new office in this territory together with Hernn Caffiero ...
